alert.note: Alert for Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; Leadville Vicinity, Lake County Below 11000 Ft; Northwestern Fremont County Above 8500Ft; Pikes Peak above 11000 Ft; Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft; Western Mosquito Range, East Chaffee County above 9000Ft; Western Mosquito Range, East Lake County Above 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Watch issued December 19 at 2:55PM MST until December 23 at 10:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills possible. Winds will be potentially approaching 60 mph with some of the higher gusts, and sustained winds could reach as high as 35 to 40 mph periodically after passage of the arctic front over the plains. Wind chills as low as 50 below zero. * WHERE... Eastern Fremont County, the I-25 corridor and the eastern plains. Teller County and Pikes Peak area. Lake County and the Sawatch/Mosquito Range. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
